column5: Been there in the past and only caught small bass and very small hammer handles ... been skunked a few times too.  Worth going back?  Any tips and tricks?

Both pike and bass are closed right now so you should probably wait till those seasons open. There are perch and crappie in Island lake, but they are even harder to find. Small jigs and grubs or tubes under floats will work.
I intended this message to mean that I was fishing here when season opens.

You should look through the search feature for posts on these areas from the past, or wait till season opens to get up to date info. Some kayak fishermen I know were there last week, when the park opened, and could not find any fish.
